name: Senior Full-Stack Developer (C#, .Net, JS, MS-SQL, Remote)
description:
ВНИМАНИЕ! Уважаемые кандидаты, для данной позиции нужен хороший уровень разговорного английского, нужно будет довольно часто на нем говорить.

We're looking for an experienced Full-Stack Developer. If your skills match the requirements, please send us your resume today!

Required skills and qualification:

  • .Net and C#;
  • Multi-threading development - deep understanding;
  • 3+ years of JavaScript & modern frameworks (React JS preferred);
  • Experience with relational database design and development (SQL, MS SQL) - advanced;
  • Ability to mock up UI solutions;
  • General understanding and knowledge on the UI/UX best practices;
  • English level- Upper-Intermediate/Advanced (B2/C1-C2).

Bonus skills:

  • Real-time pushing technologies - WebSocket, SignalR;
  • Elastic Search.

Required work experience: 6+ years
Full time, remote work from home (typical flexible working hours 10 am - 9 pm GMT+3)

TradeTheNews.com - financial news analysis company. We offer our service to thousands of clients since 1998. Joining us is a good opportunity to improve your skills of working on the challenging projects.

Benefits and additional details:

Paid time off + paid sick leave + paid national holidays.

We're a product company with 20+ years of history on the financial services market. We use time tracking, we don't follow SCRUM, we have a small team of 3-6 devs and 2 IT engineers and looking for more devs to work on new projects/features. There are some products we offer to our clients and some in-house developed systems we use inside the company, so there are a lot of places to apply your brilliant skills within our company.

Assessment process:
1) First introduction interview;

2) Online tests;

3) Technical interview;

4) Offer.
